column2: I had my dinner with Tuwo Miyar Kuka and Man Shanu at the house of Malam Abdulrahman Abdullahi, it was a delicious one. It makes my stay in Abuja a joyous one. I pray that may God Almighty bless me with a pious Wife and good cook. Thank you Abdurrahman!
